aiFeedback.name: AI-Powered Feedback

exercise.title: Student Environment - Code Exercise
exercise.description: Implement a function that calculates the factorial of an integer n. The factorial of n (denoted n!) is the product of all positive integers less than or equal to n.

feedback.title: AI Feedback
content: You handled the base case (n=0) well, but you need to complete the function for the general case.
Consider using recursion or a loop to calculate the product of all numbers from 1 to n.
Hint: For n > 0, factorial(n) = n * factorial(n-1)

test3.name: Test #3: General Case
test3.description: Expected factorial(5) to be 120, but got undefined

test4.name: Test #4: Large Number
test4.description: Expected factorial(10) to be 3628800, but got undefined

aiFeedback.title: AI Feedback

content.first: You handled the base case (n=0) well, but you need to complete the function for the general case.
content.second: Consider using recursion or a loop to calculate the product of all numbers from 1 to n.
content.third: Hint: For n > 0, factorial(n) = n * factorial(n-1)

aiFeedback.hint: Hint: For n > 0, factorial(n) = n * factorial(n-1)
aiFeedback.hintDescription: You handled the base case (n=0) well, but you need to complete the function for the general case.

progress.title: Progression of the exercise
progress.description: You have completed 50% of the exercise. Keep up the good work!

workflow-grade.title: Pedagogical Flexibility
workflow-grade.heading: All types of assignments supported
workflow-grade.description: Adapt your evaluation methods to each subject and type of exercise.

for-teachers.title: Save Time and Improve Your Teaching
for-teachers.description: Our AI-powered grading platform allows teachers to focus on what they do best: inspiring and educating students, without spending hours grading papers.
benefits: Create exams and assignments in a few clicks
Automatically grade papers with advanced AI
Track student progress with detailed analytics
Identify learning gaps for targeted intervention
Easy integration with your Learning Management System (LMS)

for-students.title: Accelerate Your Learning with Instant Feedback
for-students.description: Students progress faster with personalized feedback that helps them understand concepts and build confidence.
benefits: Receive instant and detailed feedback on your assignments
Understand exactly where you need to improve
Track your progress with visual analytics

testimonials.title: What Teachers and Students Say
testimonials.description: Our AI-powered grading platform is making a real difference in classrooms around the world.

testimonials.quote: This AI grading platform has completely transformed my classroom management. I save hours every week and can provide more relevant feedback to my students.
testimonials.author: Sarah Johnson

testimonials.quote: As a math teacher, I was skeptical about AI grading, but this platform is incredibly accurate. It even detects subtle errors in reasoning that I might miss.
testimonials.author: Michael Chen

testimonials.quote: Instant feedback has made a huge difference for my students. They are more motivated and engaged when they don't have to wait days for their results.
testimonials.author: Emily Rodriguez

testimonials.quote: Our academy has seen measurable improvements in student outcomes since implementing this AI grading system. It has been a game-changer for our teachers.
testimonials.author: Dr. James Wilson

testimonials.quote: As a student, I love getting immediate feedback on my work. It helps me understand what I'm doing well and where I need to improve right away.
testimonials.author: Aisha Patel

whyNeeded.title: Why verification is necessary?
whyNeeded.description: Verification helps us protect our platform against automated accounts and ensures that only real people can access our services. Your data is secure and will never be shared with third parties.
